Events.PreEventString: Hidden under a rock, you find $1.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: You accidentally step over a sleeping $1. It's really angry!
Events.PostEventString: The attacker runs away, leaving $1 behind.

Events.PreEventString: You find a giant glowing crystal. It looks unlike all other gems you've seen so far. You hear a voice: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
Your Pokemon find cave moss in the tunnel's wall. It is said that it can be a very potent medicine.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon eat some of the cave moss. Although it's very bitter, your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: Your Pokemon find cave moss in the tunnel's wall. It is said that it can be a very potent medicine.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon eat some of the cave moss. Although it's very bitter, your Pokemon have recovered from status conditions.

Events.PreEventString: A $1 is scared. It may have gotten lost in the tunnel.
Events.PostEventString: You let it go with you. Hopefully you can help it find the way out.

Events.PreEventString: A cloud of Zubat comes out of nowhere! They leave bites all over your Pokemon before flying away.
Events.PostEventString: Your team has sustained some damage during the encounter.

Events.PreEventString: Your Pokemon find cave moss in the tunnel's wall. It is said that it can be a very potent medicine.
Events.PostEventString: It was the wrong species! The bitterness is overwhelming and one your Pokemon got paralyzed.

Events.PreEventString: Even deep in the tunnels, there's still trainers trying to battle. Doesn't seem you'll get away from this one. Your pokemon are fully healed before the battle.
Events.PostEventString: After defeating $1, you go on your way.

Events.PreEventString: A member of the Pokemon Research Society is in the tunnel digging for fossils.
Events.PostEventString: 'No luck yet...', she says. 'But I found this $1. You can keep it''.

Events.PreEventString: 6 members of Team Paradox are hanging out in the tunnels. They seem to be doing something shady.
Events.PostEventString: One of them gives you $1 as long as you go away.

Floors.ShortcutClue: There's a smaller tunnel that you could crawl on, but it's completely filled with brittle rocks.
The soil in this area is soft. You may be able to dig a hole.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 created a passage that leads you down below.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see a wall made of dense diamonds and gemstones. It's magnificent. You also see a way out refracted through the crystals. But you'll need a Pokemon that can understand gemstones perfectly to find a way through safely.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 shines bright like a diamond. The crystals resonate with this, and light up the way through a dark opening.

BossEvent.PreEventString: You finally find the end of the tunnel. There's an underground lake. The gemstones embedded on the wall are reflected on the surface. In the center, a small Pokemon looks at you. It wishes to see what your heart holds.
BossEvent.PostEventString: The creature is satisfied, and gives you $1 as a sign of respect.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: Even though it's dark, rest is important. You should find some time for a picnic.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But now it's time to move on...
